org.jcvi.jillion.profile

Class ProfileWriterBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvi.jillion.profile.ProfileWriterBuilder

  • public class ProfileWriterBuilder
extends Object
    ProfileWriterBuilder is a builder object that is used to configure and create a ProfileWriter.
    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProfileWriterBuilder(File outputFile, NucleotideSequence referenceOrConsensus)
      Create a new ProfileWriterBuilder that will use the given reference or consensus sequence as the profile reference (and length as the profile length) and write the resulting profile to the provided file.
      ProfileWriterBuilder(OutputStream out, NucleotideSequence referenceOrConsensus)
      Create a new ProfileWriterBuilder that will use the given reference or consensus sequence as the profile reference (and length as the profile length) and write the resulting profile to the provided OutputStream.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ProfileWriter build()
      Use the given configuration data provided so far to create a ProfileWriter.
      ProfileWriterBuilder displayPercentages(DisplayCountStrategy displayPercentages)
      Set the DisplayCountStrategy to use in the profile.
      ProfileWriterBuilder ignoreGappedConsensusPositions(boolean ignoreGappedConsensusPositions) 
      ProfileWriterBuilder include0xEdges(boolean include0xEdges)
      Should 0x regions at the edge of the profile be included in the output.
      ProfileWriterBuilder setMostFrequentTieBreakerRule(MostFrequentTieBreakerRule tieBreakerRule)
      Sets the MostFrequentTieBreakerRule instance to use to govern the "most frequent" column of the profile.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProfileWriterBuilder

        public ProfileWriterBuilder(File outputFile,
                            NucleotideSequence referenceOrConsensus)
        Create a new ProfileWriterBuilder that will use the given reference or consensus sequence as the profile reference (and length as the profile length) and write the resulting profile to the provided file.
        Parameters:
        outputFile - the output file to write the profile to; can not be null.
        referenceOrConsensus - the reference sequence to use. the sequence's length is also used to determine the profile length.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either parameter is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the reference length is > Integer.MAX_VALUE.

      • ProfileWriterBuilder

        public ProfileWriterBuilder(OutputStream out,
                            NucleotideSequence referenceOrConsensus)
        Create a new ProfileWriterBuilder that will use the given reference or consensus sequence as the profile reference (and length as the profile length) and write the resulting profile to the provided OutputStream.
        Parameters:
        out - the OutputStream to write the profile to; can not be null.
        referenceOrConsensus - the reference sequence to use. the sequence's length is also used to determine the profile length.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either parameter is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the reference length is > Integer.MAX_VALUE.

    • Method Detail

      • setMostFrequentTieBreakerRule

        public ProfileWriterBuilder setMostFrequentTieBreakerRule(MostFrequentTieBreakerRule tieBreakerRule)
        Sets the MostFrequentTieBreakerRule instance to use to govern the "most frequent" column of the profile. If this method is not called, then by default MostFrequentTieBreakerRule.LOWEST_ASCII is used.
        Parameters:
        tieBreakerRule - the MostFrequentTieBreakerRule instance to use; can not be null.
        Returns:
        this.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if tieBreakerRule is null.

      • include0xEdges

        public ProfileWriterBuilder include0xEdges(boolean include0xEdges)
        Should 0x regions at the edge of the profile be included in the output. If not called, by default this value is set to true. When comparing several profiles against the same reference it is important to include the edges even if 0x in order to more easily compare them.
        Parameters:
        include0xEdges - true if should be included; false otherwise.
        Returns:
        this.

      • displayPercentages

        public ProfileWriterBuilder displayPercentages(DisplayCountStrategy displayPercentages)
        Set the DisplayCountStrategy to use in the profile. If this method is not called, then by default DisplayCountStrategy.COUNTS is used.
        Parameters:
        displayPercentages - the DisplayCountStrategy to use; can not be null.
        Returns:
        this.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if parameter is null.

      • build

        public ProfileWriter build()
                    throws IOException
        Use the given configuration data provided so far to create a ProfileWriter.
        Returns:
        a new ProfileWriter.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the output file option is used and the file is unable to be created.

      • ignoreGappedConsensusPositions

        public ProfileWriterBuilder ignoreGappedConsensusPositions(boolean ignoreGappedConsensusPositions)
